nodes.text: Niktha was a Jawa beggar who lived during the waning years of the Republic Classic era. In 32 BBY, he was wanted dead for 200 credits by the owner of the Dust Bowl saloon in Mos Gamos for turning away potential patrons with his aggressive begging. In the same year, he was killed and his bounty claimed by Jango Fett, who had been hunting for Longo Two-Guns to gain an audience with Jabba the Hutt.
